summary:
I am an accomplished software developer with a strong background in frontend development and a proven track record of delivering high-quality solutions. As an open-minded individual, I thrive on collaboration and new opportunities, embracing diverse perspectives to foster innovation and drive success in software development.

My journey began as a Junior Frontend Developer, developing websites for local small businesses. Over the years, I honed my ability to work effectively in diverse team environments and expanded my technical expertise. I have held various roles, from Web Developer and Frontend Developer to Software Developer, Senior Software Developer, and currently, Lead Software Developer. In each role, I contributed to team and project success through adaptability, teamwork, and commitment to quality.

As a frontend engineer, my core skill set includes TypeScript, which I prefer over JavaScript. I am experienced with React-based frameworks such as Next.js and Gatsby, libraries like Redux, MobX, Effector and RxJS, and infrastructure toolchain like Webpack and Node.js. I am also well-versed in tools like ESLint and Prettier and have experience with CI/CD pipelines, Docker, and *nix operating systems.

I am an alumnus of Moscow Power Engineering Institute, holding an engineer's degree in Optoelectronic Devices and Systems. My academic background has provided me with a strong foundation in engineering and nurtured my ability to efficiently learn, consume, and structure information.

Outside of work, I engage in developer relations by participating in a podcast about development and life at the company. This involvement allows me to connect with like-minded individuals, share knowledge, and contribute to the growth of the broader development community.

In conclusion, I am excited to engage in meaningful collaborations and explore new possibilities, whether working on a team project, mentoring a colleague, or taking on a new challenge. I am committed to bringing my passion, adaptability, and problem-solving skills to every endeavor, ensuring that I am always ready for collaboration and new opportunities.
